name: Doc McStuffins: School of Madicine
summary: Doc McStuffins and her toy friends need help decorating the backyard in Create & Explore with Doc for VTech’s InnoTab systems. Play games that let you decorate banners, create costumes and make clay models of favorite characters. You can also play different instruments in a band with Doc’s friends. Along the way help Doc bring sick toys back to perfect health step-by-step. Open Doc’s Big Book of Boo-Boos to see each toy’s diagnosis and accompanying health tip. Then read the e-Book to learn what happens to Robot Ray when Hallie and Stuffy try to fill in for Doc in Diagnosis Not Even Close-is.
